situation.title: Health resorts
situation.meta_description: It is only possible to offer rehabilitation and spa care that is at least partially funded from the public health insurance.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

It is only possible to offer rehabilitation and spa care that is at least partially covered by the public health insurance. It is prohibited to provide wellness and recreational stays. 

The maximum amount of people accommodated in one room is one person. Exception applies to family/household members. In addition, all visits are prohibited.

If receiving a spa treatment, follow the increased hygiene measures and wear a respirator or other protective equipment without an exhalation valve with a filtration efficiency of at least 94% (class FFP2 / KN 95) in the common areas . You can find out more about the obligation of respiratory protection in the Face Masks topic.

If you have any signs of a respiratory illness (a cough or breathing problems) or a temperature before your stay, please visit your doctor, get tested and postpone your stay. If you meet with someone who has been tested positive, arrange a test for you before your stay.

Medical care and other illnesses cannot be neglected as a result of Covid-19. If you are without any signs of coronavirus and your doctor prescribes the stay for you, you can undergo your spa treatment. Please be considerate to other spa guests and staff and adhere to basic hygiene measures. 

Pay attention to the new restriction adjusting the free movement of persons which is in force from March 1, 2021. Now, you need a confirmation when you cross the district borders. Learn more about the free movement of persons here.

questions_answers.question: Can I go to the spa if I have a coronavirus?
Can I go to the spa for a wellness stay?
Can I go to the spa after the operation if my doctor has prescribed it for me?
Can I have visits at the spa?
Can I go to the spa pool when I get a spa stay here?
Is a negative test required on arrival at the spa?
questions_answers.value: No. However, your temperature can be measured.

questions_answers.question: Do I have to wear a respirator for the duration of my stay?
questions_answers.value: Yes, class FFP2 or KN95, or other respiratory protection that is at least 94% effective - these are for example nano face masks.

questions_answers.question: What are the vouchers for COVID-SPA program?
questions_answers.value: These are vouchers provided within the COVID-SPA compensation program. However, vouchers can only be used in one of the spas, so check your availability at kudyznudy.cz before purchasing a specific stay.
